column2: A preference for following in the footsteps of others rather than initiating action. Reliable in producing results, as long as someone else provides the initial ideas. Weak survival mechanisms.
An enjoyment of challenge and action, with frustration arising when change is not possible. An expectation that others will also rise to a challenge.
A tendency to move from one thing to another, finding it difficult to settle down. An enjoyment of change, though lacking the stability needed to see things through.
A dislike of change. An expectation of reliability in others.
Difficulty adapting to new situations. A tendency toward inflexibility when faced with the demands of change and other people.
A tendency to procrastinate. An expectation that others will be flexible.
